content: updated 8/1/2014 hug monster by distracted design labs page 1 of 6 © distracted design labs updated 8/1/2014 hug monster by distracted design labs materials list red heart with love solids in lettuce #1601 or equivalent for body red heart super saver in pale yellow #0322 or equivalent in horn color of choice red heart super saver in black #0312 or equivalent for mouth size g/6 4 25mm crochet hook tapestry or darning needle white and black craft felt white and black thread stitch marker or a piece of yarn to mark the ends of rounds fiberfill for stuffing special stitch decrease = single_crochet decrease to make this stitch almost invisible insert crochet hook into front loop of next stitch yarn over then pull through keep the loop on the hook then insert hook into front loop of next stitch yarn over and pull through there should be 3 loops on the hook yarn over and pull through all three loops abbreviations single_crochet= single_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet st = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain decrease = single_crochet decrease final size 8 inches 20cm tall note this little guy is crocheted in continuous spiral rounds do not join rounds use a stitch marker to keep track of the rounds page 2 of 6 © distracted design labs updated 8/1/2014 hug monster s left arm 1 work 6 single_crochet into magic_ring 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 st 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 7 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of next 6 single_crochet 12 st 8 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of next 6 half_double_crochet 12 st 9 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of next 6 half_double_crochet 12 st 10 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of next 6 half_double_crochet 12 st 11 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of next 6 half_double_crochet 12 st 12 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of next 6 half_double_crochet 12 st single_crochet in next stitch then slip_stitch to fasten_off and end with long tail stuff firmly maintaining bend in arm hug monster s right arm 1 work 6 single_crochet into magic_ring 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 st 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 7 half_double_crochet in 6 single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 6 single_crochet 12 st 8
